Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Lowe
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted,76th, Vincennes, and 79th due to fire department activity near 79th/Lowe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted,76th, Vincennes, and 79th due to fire department activity near 79th/Lowe.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red and Linden-bound Purple Line Express Service Delayed near Sheridan
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red and Linden-bound Purple Line Express trains are standing near Sheridan due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red and Linden-bound Purple Line Express trains are standing near Sheridan due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
